mainText:
The world has lost a great man...a visionary of the best kind. He was  
a DaVinci of our time. I never knew him personally and yet tears come  
to my eyes. I have lived by the statement... once you go Mac, you  
never go back... and I certainly will always be an Apple lover. May he  
rest in peace and may his many friends bring comfort to his family.
author: Anne
